name: Zouyu
movement: 60 feet walking speed allows efficient mobility
description: A huge creature with a vibrant, multi-stranded tail that exudes wild energy and unpredictable tactics.
memorable: The Zouyu can alter luck, impacting the outcome of critical rolls during combat.
goals: Typically seeks to support allies in battle while disrupting enemies with its luck-manipulating abilities.
relations: Might be related or found with other chaotic good creatures.
environment: Usually found in wild or untamed areas where chaos thrives.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity allows it to dodge effectively, and its high Armor Class and hit points provide resilience.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to thunder damage, taking double damage from such attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with a bite and claw attacks, employing quick and strategic movements.
most_powerful_ability: Alter Luck can significantly shift the outcome of combat by granting advantage to allies or imposing disadvantage on enemies.
senses: Possesses keen sight and smell, granting advantage on Perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, making it adept at remaining unnoticed.
additional_information: Can run an astonishing 310 miles in a day when at a fast pace.
Ability to knock enemies prone if charging and hitting with a claw attack.
High Dexterity saving throw bonus of +10.
Unique combination of tactical support and resilient combat abilities.
test_queries: chaotic good huge wild energy creature
mobile skirmisher that alters luck in combat
Zouyu abilities to support allies and disrupt enemies
huge creature with exceptional Dexterity and chaotic traits
thunder vulnerability with strong perception skills
